entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Athabasca
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:32 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Athabasca 07:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -11.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
